headline: RLI's Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates on Strong Net Investment Income
summary: RLI's quarterly results reflect higher premium earned and improved investment income, offset by escalating expenses and poor underwriting income.

raw.headline: RLI's Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates on Strong Net Investment Income
raw.summary: RLI's quarterly results reflect higher premium earned and improved investment income, offset by escalating expenses and poor underwriting income.

headline: W.R. Berkley Q2 Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates
summary: WRB tops Q2 estimates with stronger underwriting and investment gains, despite elevated catastrophe losses.

raw.headline: W.R. Berkley Q2 Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates

headline: Here’s Why Progressive (PGR) Traded Lower in Q2
summary: Madison Investments, an investment advisor, released its “Madison Large Cap Fund” second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In the second quarter, the fund (Class Y) increased 3.1%, compared to a 10.9% gain for the S&P 500 index. In addition, please check the fund’s top five holdings to know […]

headline: New Strong Buy Stocks for July 22nd
summary: BTG, PGR, BAYRY, BCH and LNW have been added to the Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy) List on July 22, 2025.
